narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this announced pre-license inspection. 
This is a 1st Pre-license Inspection for a Class B license.  The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
Applicant. The Applicant is ready to be licensed under the AWA. 
A copy of your license will be sent to you without further action from you. If you have not received your license within 30 
days, please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478. 
 
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES  MAY BE CONDUCTED  UNTIL  A VALID USDA LICENSE IS RECEIVED. 
 
End Section
